The Tianrun Detong Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, China

operators: 山西天润煤化集团德通煤业有限公司 (Shanxi Tianrun Coal Chemical Group Detong Coal Industry Company)
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Tianrun Coal Chemical Group and owned by Yantai Guofeng Investment Holding Group.
